channel.title: How do I MOVE / REMOVE The Flames in 317? Also need text effects working
channel.description:
I need to either move or completely take out the fire that shows up on the 317 loading/login screen.
Anyone know how to do?
Also, I still need to enable text colors & effects for my 317. Original thread was here asking how to do it: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381577.0.html
But you can just let me know in here too.
Thanks!

item.title: How do I MOVE / REMOVE The Flames in 317? Also need text effects working
item.dc:creator: @Yodoxin Yodoxin
item.description:
@Yodoxin wrote:

To delete the flames without any glitches just search in client.java for:

method58(25106); method58(25106);

and remove it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I MOVE / REMOVE The Flames in 317? Also need text effects working
